title: Dust On My Shoes
description: A new Marco Polo emerges as one reads the vivid pages of Dust on my Shoes. He is Peter Pinney, adventurer and wanderer extraordinary, whose flair for finding the dramatic, dangerous and unusual in experiences and people makes this record of his travels a spirited chronicle, robust, lively, exciting.Setting out from Greece, Pinney travelled through the countries of the Mediterranean and the Middle East, over the snow-covered mountains of Afghanistan, across the plains of India to the steaming jungles of Assam and Burma.
author: Peter Pinney
